name: Imperium Host
description:
Command an entire squadrons in this unorthodox idle RPG, with deep customisation, unique casts, and growing scales.  Inspired by Melvor Idle and Path of Exile.

  • Featuring over 20+ characters to collect! 50+ gears to find! 150+ skills to pick! With more to come! <---- (it depends)
  • Stylized in gacha-game aesthetic, but without the gachas, or any fancy animations. You just get static PNG drawn by me.
  • Assemble not just one party, but your entire rosters! Every single character you recruit will have a job to do, either fighting in a squad or running solo mission.
  • Main gameplay loop is sending your squads to run randomly generated maps for currency, akin to Path of Exile style of map grinding.
  • Micromanage multiple ongoing battles at once! Or go idle and just let your squads handle themselves. Offline progress included, of course.
  • No prestiges, increments are tiny, but last forever.
  • Play casually, fire and forget once you had everything set up. Or dive deep into the theorycrafting hole, as you figure out which skill synergise with each other, or which characters complement one another.

This is a sequel to Idle Hamlet. Final release is planned on Android. For discussion, bug report, or just hanging out, join the game  Discord server!

***Saving file on web browser is not safe! Export save code before closing the tab, or download the standalone version if you plan on playing longer.***
